sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSADJUSTINFOREG where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERIALNO = :serialno and CHANNELID = :channelid and TXNSEQ = :txnseq

insert into LNSADJUSTINFOREG (TRANDATE, SERIALNO, CHANNELID, TXNSEQ, ACCDATE, SERSEQNO, TRANSOURCE, BRC, CCY, TRANAMT, AMT1, AMT2, AMT3, AMT4, AMT5, AMT6, TRANCODE, TELLER, BRIEFCODE, TRANBRIEF, RECEIPTNO, ACCSTAT, ACCTNO, MERCHANTNO, TOACCSTAT, TOACCOUNTNO, TOMERCHANTNO, TIMESTAMP, FLAG, BANKCHANNEL, RESERV0, RESERV1, RESERV2, RESERV3, RESERV4, RESERV5, RESERV6, RESERV7, RESERV8, RESERV9, TUNNELDATA) values (:trandate, :serialno, :channelid, :txnseq, :accdate, :serseqno, :transource, :brc, :ccy, :tranamt, :amt1, :amt2, :amt3, :amt4, :amt5, :amt6, :trancode, :teller, :briefcode, :tranbrief, :receiptno, :accstat, :acctno, :merchantno, :toaccstat, :toaccountno, :tomerchantno, current timestamp, :flag, :bankchannel, :reserv0, :reserv1, :reserv2, :reserv3, :reserv4, :reserv5, :reserv6, :reserv7, :reserv8, :reserv9, :tunneldata)

update LNSADJUSTINFOREG set ACCDATE = :accdate, SERSEQNO = :serseqno, TRANSOURCE = :transource, BRC = :brc, CCY = :ccy, TRANAMT = :tranamt, AMT1 = :amt1, AMT2 = :amt2, AMT3 = :amt3, AMT4 = :amt4, AMT5 = :amt5, AMT6 = :amt6, TRANCODE = :trancode, TELLER = :teller, BRIEFCODE = :briefcode, TRANBRIEF = :tranbrief, RECEIPTNO = :receiptno, ACCSTAT = :accstat, ACCTNO = :acctno, MERCHANTNO = :merchantno, TOACCSTAT = :toaccstat, TOACCOUNTNO = :toaccountno, TOMERCHANTNO = :tomerchantno, TIMESTAMP = current timestamp, FLAG = :flag, BANKCHANNEL = :bankchannel, RESERV0 = :reserv0, RESERV1 = :reserv1, RESERV2 = :reserv2, RESERV3 = :reserv3, RESERV4 = :reserv4, RESERV5 = :reserv5, RESERV6 = :reserv6, RESERV7 = :reserv7, RESERV8 = :reserv8, RESERV9 = :reserv9, TUNNELDATA = :tunneldata where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERIALNO = :serialno and CHANNELID = :channelid and TXNSEQ = :txnseq

select TRANDATE, SERIALNO, CHANNELID, TXNSEQ, ACCDATE, SERSEQNO, TRANSOURCE, BRC, CCY, TRANAMT, AMT1, AMT2, AMT3, AMT4, AMT5, AMT6, TRANCODE, TELLER, BRIEFCODE, TRANBRIEF, RECEIPTNO, ACCSTAT, ACCTNO, MERCHANTNO, TOACCSTAT, TOACCOUNTNO, TOMERCHANTNO, TIMESTAMP, FLAG, BANKCHANNEL, RESERV0, RESERV1, RESERV2, RESERV3, RESERV4, RESERV5, RESERV6, RESERV7, RESERV8, RESERV9, TUNNELDATA from LNSADJUSTINFOREG where TRANDATE = :trandate and SERIALNO = :serialno and CHANNELID = :channelid and TXNSEQ = :txnseq
